title: Tax Audit ðŸ“‹
ques: When is **tax audit** required under Section 44AB?

answer.content:
**Required if**:
* Business turnover > Rs. 1 crore (Rs. 10 crore if cash < 5%)
* Profession gross receipts > Rs. 50 lakhs
* Claiming lower profit than presumptive
* Opted out of presumptive scheme

**Report**: Form 3CA/3CB + 3CD

explanation: Due date: ***One month before return due date***.
